name: betterboxd
description: movie review web app that utilizes LetterBoxd API

scripts.build-view: cd view && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-controller && npm run build-model && npm run build-view

authors: Mik-Ese, fmhossai, ethangillengg, cheyennegoh, Arne-Hilao, maxbotham, Lucas
